Microsoft_AutomaticReplies_Description: absentify can configure the automatic out of office replies in Outlook for you. You can configure one out-of-office message per leave type. When that absence occurs, absentify will configure the same day out of office message into your Outlook setting.
Microsoft_AutomaticReplies_Description_2: This feature is still brand new, we appreciate any
Birthday_and_anniversary_reminders_descr: Receive an email every week on your chosen start day at 8 a.m. with upcoming birthdays and anniversaries for the week, if at least one of them is coming up.
This_feature_is_not_available_for_your_p: This feature requires at least a Essentials Plan to activate birthday and anniversary reminders.
Weekly_absence_summary_description: Receive an email every week on your chosen start day at 8 a.m. with a summary of all absence requests for the week.
This_feature_is_not_available_for_your_p: This feature requires at least a Essentials Plan to activate weekly absence summary.
Calendar_invitations_description: Receive calendar invitations to keep your Outlook calendar in sync.
Calendar_invitations_description_admin: Activate the Microsoft API and we will keep your employees' calendars automatically synchronized. No more need for invitations.
outOfOfficeExternalMessagePlaceholder:
Hi there,

Thank you for your email. I am currently out of the office and will return on {{dateOfReturn}}.

If you require immediate assistance, please contact {{approverName[1]}} at {{approverMail[1]}}. Otherwise, I will respond to your message as soon as possible upon my return.

Best regards,

{{name}}
outOfOfficeInternalMessagePlaceholder:
Hi there,

I am currently out of the office and will return on {{dateOfReturn}}.

If you need assistance, please reach out to {{approverName[1]}}, who is handling my tasks while I am away.

For urgent matters, feel free to message me on Microsoft Teams.

Thank you,

{{name}}
outOfOfficeOutsideHeaderDescription: Update this templates using custom properties for send automatic reply messages to senders outside your organization.
outOfOfficeInsideHeaderDescription: Update this templates using custom properties for send automatic reply messages to senders inside your organization.
EnableOutOfOfficeMessgageForLeaveType: Enable out of office message for this leave type?
confirm_delete_auto_reply: Are you sure you want to delete the out of office notification for this leave type?
Display_calendar_weeks_description: The calendar weeks displays a number of each calendar week in overview and my calendar.
No_access: Admin restricted access to edit out of office messages. To enable editing out of office messages please contact admin of your workspace.
Email: Email: Receive notifications directly in your email inbox.
Teams: Teams Notification: Receive notifications as direct messages within Microsoft Teams.
EmailAndTeams: Both: Receive notifications through both email and Teams direct messages.
absentify_desc: Enable this option to receive the latest updates and features from absentify.
Notificaions_receving_method_desc: Choose how you'd like to receive notifications about your absence requests. You can opt for emails, direct messages in Microsoft Teams, or both.
